captions.text:
- Exactly, stay like that and try to stretch
your back and paws as much as you can -

- Always breathing -
- Now go down with your paws and try to stretch

your neck as much as you can -
- Well done -

- Now go down again with your neck and slowly
rotate your head on the left, so you can relax

- Now go back to the starting position, trying
to stretch yourself ahead and going slowly

on the right with your neck, trying to relax
your muscles -

- Ok, now stay straight and breathe -
- Try to widen your ears -

- Now turn slightly again your head on the
right and slowly on the left -

- Now try to stretch your neck ahead and lift
your body up, trying to stretch your throat

and neck muscles as much as you can -
- Perfect -

- Now go down and it's over, bravo Panchino!
--

my mind.

#yoga  
Животные обожают проводить время вместе с хозяевами, но этот малыш #чихуахуа 
готов даже зарядку повторять за своим владельцем, лишь бы не отставать от 
него ни в чем. Результат этих занятий - подтянутые стройные фигуры и 
огромная порция позитива﻿
